name: Nintendo Game Boy Color - Maroon
description: The first Nintendo handheld with backward compatibility, presented in maroon. Plays original Game Boy and Game Boy Color games.
conditionSummary: Excellent shape. Light scratch on the screen. Barcode on back not in best shape but replaceable. Battery bay excellent (no corrosion/rust). All stock. Some yellowing/bumpy feeling on barcode.
includedAccessories: Console Only (Host offers to include AA batteries)

name: Nintendo Game Boy Advance SP - Red
description: Red Game Boy Advance SP with a foldable design and backlit screen. Compatible with Game Boy, Game Boy Color, and Game Boy Advance games.

specifications.label: Compatibility
specifications.value: Game Boy, Game Boy Color, Game Boy Advance

conditionSummary: Not in as good shape. Lots of scratches, some missing film on screen. Wear on siding. Shell and screen not best shape. Game Boy label on back faded. Cartridge port interior fantastic. Shoulder buttons great. Buttons responsive. Internal battery in great shape (not bulging). All stock.

name: Nintendo DSi - White (Japanese Version)
description: White Nintendo DSi (Japanese Version) in pretty much pristine condition. Features dual cameras and an SD card slot.

specifications.label: Features
specifications.value: Dual Cameras, SD Card Slot, DSi Shop (defunct)

conditionSummary: Pretty much pristine. Game card slot fine, SD card slot fine (SD card included). Internal battery flat (good). Headphone port fine. Shoulder buttons working. Hinge tight/responsive. Screens crystal clear. Minor wear on D-pad/buttons. Host will clean screens.

name: Nintendo 3DS XL - (Japanese Version "LL")
description: Nintendo 3DS XL (Japanese 'LL' Version) with 3D display capability and dual cameras. Many Japanese 3DS games have English language options.

specifications.label: Features
specifications.value: Dual Cameras, eShop (defunct), 3D Slider, Wireless Button

conditionSummary: Some scratches on shell (top/back), markings. Suggests cover/shell replacement. SD card slot has SD card. Wireless button working. 3D slider working. Shoulder buttons working. Circle pad, D-pad, other buttons responsive/not sticky. Touchscreen responsive. Cameras working. Front is in worst shape but better than the GBA SP.
